intro: Erodium niveum, commonly known as the snow erodium, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is a small annual herb that typically grows to a height of about 10–20 centimeters. The plant features delicate, white or pale pink flowers that bloom in clusters during the spring and summer months. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, giving them a slightly fuzzy texture. Erodium niveum is often found in sandy or gravelly soils and is adapted to arid environments.
